name: TheLonelyHeartsHotline
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Misery loves company! If you are lonely, listen to what others who are also feeling lonely have to say.

If you wish to pitch in with your thoughts and feelings, please go here and leave an audio recording: https://www.witlingo.com/the-lonely-hearts-hotline/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
